short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays a new computer science term and definition every day

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing the Computer Science Word Of The Day Extension! This extension is perfect for anyone interested in expanding their knowledge of computer science, whether you're a student or a professional. Every day, the extension will display a new computer science term and its definition right on your browser. Not only will you learn something new every day, but it's also a great way to increase your vocabulary and improve your understanding of the field. Plus, it's easy to install and use, so you can start learning right away. So why not give it a try and expand your computer science knowledge today!
